Kentucky Derby
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: Still saddened by the death of his filly Eight Belles, the owner Rick Porter said Monday that he had no regrets about running her in the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Still saddened by the death of his filly Eight Belles, the owner Rick Porter said Monday that he had no regrets about running her in the Kentucky Derby.
